title: The Adventures of Rocky & Bullwinkle
creator_credit: Universal Pictures, Dritte Beteiligung KC Median AG and Co, Jane Rosenthal, Robert De Niro and Des McAnuff
brief_description: 35 years after the cancellation of the successful cartoon show “Rocky & Bullwinkle” and there is a plea for them to save the world when evil cold war cohorts Fearless Leader (Robert De Niro), Boris (Jason Alexander) and Natasha (Rene Russo) find a way of making it from being an animated character to a real one. Fearless Leader plans to buy up as much cable television time as possible for their program RBTV (really bad television) and feed mindless drivel to the masses, turn them into zombies, and provide malleable intellects to support his plans for being president. FBI agent Karen Sympathy (Piper Perabo) brings the moose and the squirrel back into the real world and takes a road trip with her cartoon heroes in pursuit of Fearless Leader. An impressive blend of animation and live action, the cast also includes Randy Quaid and features cameos by John Goodman, Billy Crystal and Whoopi Goldberg. Pitched at both adults and children, there are sight gags and corny puns as well as plenty of irony for those that can notice. Written by Kenneth Lonergan and based on characters developed by Jay Ward.
